span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

span.span: Based on today’s recommendation by Governor Murphy, schools will continue to remain closed until at least May 15. We will continue with online learning and food distribution each Monday, as scheduled. We will pass along new information as it is received.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

span.span: Según la recomendación de hoy del Gobernador Murphy, las escuelas continuarán cerradas hasta al menos el 15 de mayo. Continuaremos con el aprendizaje en línea y la distribución de alimentos cada lunes, según lo programado. Transmitiremos nueva información a medida que se reciba.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

span.span: Please be advised that schools will not reopen on Monday, April 20 as originally planned. Due to the nature of the virus and government restrictions, schools will remain closed until we receive further guidance. Food distribution will take place on April 6 and then resume on April 20.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

span.span: Please continue to practice social distancing and stay safe.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

span.span: Tenga en cuenta que las escuelas no volverán a abrir el lunes 20 de abril como se planeó originalmente. Debido a la naturaleza del virus y las restricciones gubernamentales, las escuelas permanecerán cerradas hasta que recibamos más orientación. La distribución de alimentos tendrá lugar el 6 de abril y luego se reanudará el 20 de abril.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

span.span: Continúa practicando el distanciamiento social y mantente seguro.

div.p: Although there have been no confirmed cases of COVID-19 in Cumberland County, out of an abundance of caution the county superintendents and the health department have decided to close all Vineland Public Schools starting on Tuesday, March 17. Schools will remain closed through spring break and classes will resume on April 20.
Schools will operate on a regular schedule tomorrow (Monday). We will share further information regarding online learning and assignments tomorrow.
Please be aware that there will be no before and after care available while schools are closed.
We encourage you to keep your children away from crowded areas to reduce the risk of infection.

span.style: font-size: 16px; caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: -apple-system, HelveticaNeue; -webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;

p.span: If you cannot download or open a file or assignment in Google Classroom, please contact your teacher first. They will be able to share it directly with you or email it as an attachment.

hr.p: Breakfast and lunch will be available at 7 a.m. - 11 a.m. at your child’s school on Wednesday, March 18; Thursday, March 19; and Friday, March 20.

Beginning Monday, March 23, the school will be open at 7 a.m. - 11 a.m. on Mondays only to pick up breakfast and lunch for your children for the week. This service is available to all families. On Monday, March 23, March 30, and April 6, you are asked to bring your child’s identification number to his/her school when you pick up food. If you have children in different schools, please go to the school of your youngest child.

For students in the VHS North, Cunningham and Johnstone schools, food will be available for pick up at VHS South. All preschool families can pick up food for their children at one location: Dallago Preschool (240 S. W. Ave. - 6th Street entrance).
If your child attends an out of district school and you would like access to breakfast and lunch please stop by one of the schools listed below:
All schools will be open on the dates listed above from 7AM - 11AM.
Pilla - bus entrance area - NW area
VHS Campus including Johnstone - South cafeteria entrance
